forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning, then clear. High of 91F. Winds from the SW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning, then clear. High of 33C. Breezy. Winds from the SW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low of 68F. Breezy. Winds from the SW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low of 20C. Windy. Winds from the SW at 20 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High of 86F. Winds from the WNW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High of 30C. Breezy. Winds from the WNW at 15 to 20 km/h.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low of 55F. Winds from the NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low of 13C. Winds from the NNW at 5 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning, then clear. High of 84F. Winds from the ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning, then clear. High of 29C. Winds from the ESE at 5 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy with a chance of a thunderstorm and a chance of rain after midnight. Low of 54F. Winds from the North at 5 to 10 mph shifting to the ESE after midnight. Chance of rain 20%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy with a chance of a thunderstorm and a chance of rain after midnight. Low of 12C. Winds from the North at 5 to 15 km/h shifting to the ESE after midnight.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy with a chance of a thunderstorm and a chance of rain. High of 81F. Winds from the SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy with a chance of a thunderstorm and a chance of rain. High of 27C. Breezy. Winds from the SE at 10 to 20 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy with a chance of a thunderstorm and a chance of rain, then a chance of rain after midnight. Fog overnight. Low of 52F. Breezy. Winds from the East at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50% with rainfall amounts near 0.2 in. possible.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy with a chance of a thunderstorm and a chance of rain, then a chance of rain after midnight. Fog overnight. Low of 11C. Breezy. Winds from the East at 20 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50% with rainfall amounts near 5.6 mm possible.
